availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: F. J. Thibault (San Francisco, California, merchant, commissioner, and notary)

body.p: San Francisco, California, merchant, commissioner, and notary. Maryland native. Merchant in San Francisco in 1852. Notary public in San Francisco in 1859 and 1862. Commissioner of Deeds in San Franscico in 1862 and 1864.

bibl.p: Manuscript Census of the State of California (1852), Population Schedule, California, San Francisco County, San Francisco, p. 141; Petaluma Argus (Petaluma, Calif.) January 21, 1863, p. 4; San Francisco Directory, For the Year Commencing September, 1862, Henry G. Langley, comp. (San Francisco: Commercial Steam Presses: Valentine & Co., 1862), p. 444 and 546 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
